name: The badly cursed treasure
description:
A short game made for Adventuron Cavejam 2019

Your grandfather has passed away recently, And he left you a treasure map. Do you think you're able to find some treasure?

The game has 3 endings.

If you're stuck somewhere comment below and I'll help as much as I can.

If you enjoyed the game, please spend a minute and rate the game on the jam page.

P.S: English is not my first language. You may find language errors in the game.
